reviews.text: Abang  Darwisy and Kakak Lindah, thank you so much! Thanks also for Archie and Abang Ryan!! Also thanks a lot for the ground landing personnels Kak Elina and Kak Mun. Their staffs are super nice and friendly. Very recommended to try the Megazip! Depart at the hill, land at the beach. so exciting!

Massive shout out to Mun for awesome customer service. After the Sentosa app failing when we tried to book discounted tickets she happily applied these manually. Would also like to commend her for helping our son who was sick to make sure we were looked after.

The rest of the team at the booking desk were also awesome and friendly (Halim, Nova, Ayu, and Lindah).

Our family hope to come back to Singapore next year and will definitely be back on the zip line for another round ðŸ˜ƒ

Our group had an amazing time doing the Mega Climb, Mega Jump, and Mega Zip adventures! The staff were so patient when some of us changed our level of difficulty. Thanks to Suha, Elena, Linda, and all the guys who assisted us. Until next time!

I would like to commend Adi for his amazing encouragement and patience with my child during her experience on the Mega Bounce. He was incredibly supportive and motivated her to overcome her fears, guiding her step by step until she achieved her first flip! His friendly and approachable nature made the experience enjoyable and memorable for both of us. Thank you, Adi, for going above and beyond to inspire confidence in my child. Highly recommended!

Came during a weekday for the zip line and had no crowd.  Thereâ€™s a buggy that takes you up to the top and it was awesome!  All the staff we talked to was so kind, huge shout out to Lucy especially!  Would recommend bringing a clear bag to put your phone in to take a video or photo so you can take your own photo.  For early bird tickets book a day ahead!
